embed: <object width="640" height="480"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/yEP42WgfaSs?version=3&hl=en_US&rel=0"></param><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param><param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"></param><embed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/yEP42WgfaSs?version=3&hl=en_US&rel=0" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="640" height="480" allowscriptaccess="always" allowfullscreen="true"></embed></object>
summary:
Cloudant Engineer Joan Touzet will explain the design decisions that led the
company to rewrite the supporting API layer to all its back-end systems in
Python using the Flask microframework to create a unified, RESTful API.
title: Hit the Flask and Get Some REST: Rewriting the Cloudant API in a Single Python Back End
